trans-unit.source: Encapsulates a single record in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 封装单个记录事件日志中。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: You usually will not create instances of EventLogEntry directly when working with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> class.
trans-unit.target: 你通常不会创建 EventLogEntry 的实例直接时使用的<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>类。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A> member of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> class contains a collection of EventLogEntry instances, which you iterate over when reading by using the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName> class index member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>的成员<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog>类包含 EventLogEntry 实例，通过使用读取时循环访问集合<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName>类索引成员。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntryCollection.Item%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.Entries%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 此类型实现<xref:System.IDisposable>接口。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 完成后使用类型的操作后，你应释放类型直接或间接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接释放类型，调用其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>中的方法`try` / `catch`块。</xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要间接释放类型，使用一种语言构造如`using`（在 C# 中) 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用实现 IDisposable 的对象"部分<xref:System.IDisposable>接口主题。</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the text associated with the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.CategoryNumber*> property for this entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取与关联的文本<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.CategoryNumber*>此项的属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.CategoryNumber*>

trans-unit.source: Each application (event source) can define its own numbered categories and the text strings to which they are mapped.
trans-unit.target: 每个应用程序 （事件源） 可以定义自己带编号的类别以及它们映射到的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer can use the category to filter events in the log.
trans-unit.target: 事件查看器可以在日志中使用的类别筛选事件。

trans-unit.source: The application-specific category text.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序特定类别文本。

trans-unit.source: The space could not be allocated for one of the insertion strings associated with the category.
trans-unit.target: 与类别关联的插入字符串之一，无法分配空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the category number of the event log entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取事件日志项的类别号。

trans-unit.source: Each application (event source) can define its own numbered categories and the text strings to which they are mapped.
trans-unit.target: 每个应用程序 （事件源） 可以定义自己带编号的类别以及它们映射到的文本字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer can use the category to filter events in the log.
trans-unit.target: 事件查看器可以在日志中使用的类别筛选事件。

trans-unit.source: The categories must be numbered consecutively beginning with the number 1.
trans-unit.target: 类别必须是连续编号开头使用数字 1。

trans-unit.source: The category number is specified by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 指定的类别号<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.CategoryId%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer can display the category as a numeric value, or it can use the category as a resource identifier to display a localized category string.
trans-unit.target: 事件查看器可将类别显示为数字值，或者它可以作为资源标识符使用类别，以显示本地化的类别字符串。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance>

trans-unit.source: The application-specific category number for this entry.
trans-unit.target: 此项应用程序特定类别号。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binary data associated with the entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此项关联的二进制数据。

trans-unit.source: Getting this property creates an array that holds a copy of the entry's event-specific binary data, which the Event Viewer displays in combined hexadecimal and text format.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性创建一个数组，其中包含的项的特定事件的二进制数据，其中显示组合的十六进制转义序列和文本格式中的事件查看器的副本。

trans-unit.source: Event-specific data is sometimes used to store information that the application will process independently of the Event Viewer, for example, to make reports from the log file.
trans-unit.target: 特定于事件的数据有时用来存储应用程序将独立于事件查看器中，例如处理的信息，以使报表从日志文件。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes that holds the binary data associated with the entry.
trans-unit.target: 包含与此项关联的二进制数据的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Gets the event type of this entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取此项的事件类型。

trans-unit.source: All event types have well-defined common data and can optionally include event-specific data.
trans-unit.target: 所有事件类型具有定义完善的常用数据，并且可以根据需要包含特定于事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: Each event is of a single type, which the application indicates when it reports the event.
trans-unit.target: 每个事件是应用程序将指示它在报告事件时的单一类型。

trans-unit.source: The Event Viewer uses the event type to determine which icon to display in the list view of the event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件查看器使用的事件类型来确定要在事件日志的列表视图中显示的图标。

trans-unit.source: The event type that is associated with the entry in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 与事件日志中的条目相关联的事件类型。

trans-unit.source: Performs a comparison between two event log entries.
trans-unit.target: 执行两个事件日志条目之间的比较。

trans-unit.source: This method performs a byte-by-byte comparison between the two objects.
trans-unit.target: 此方法执行两个对象之间的逐字节比较。

trans-unit.source: It does not determine whether the two <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry> instances refer to the same object.
trans-unit.target: 它不会不确定是否两个<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry>实例引用同一对象。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry"> </xref>进行比较。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry"></xref> objects are identical; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry"></xref>对象是完全相同; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the application-specific event identifier for the current event entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前事件项的应用程序特定事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: This value represents the event identifier for the entry in the event log, with the top two bits masked off.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志，并且最顶部的两位掩码中，此值表示的项的事件标识符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.InstanceId%2A> property for an event log entry represents the full 32-bit resource identifier for the event in the message resource file for the event source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.InstanceId%2A>一个事件日志条目的属性表示为事件源的消息资源文件中的事件的完整的 32 位资源标识符。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.InstanceId%2A>

trans-unit.source: Two event log entries from the same source can have matching EventID values, but have different <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.InstanceId%2A> values due to differences in the top two bits of the event identifier.
trans-unit.target: 来自同一源的两个事件日志条目可以拥有匹配的 EventID 值，但具有不同<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.InstanceId%2A>存在差异导致的事件标识符最高两位的值。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.InstanceId%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application wrote the event entry using one of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> methods, the EventID property matches the optional `eventId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序写入事件项使用之一<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，EventID 属性匹配可选`eventId`参数。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application wrote the event using <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A> or the Win32 API `ReportEvent`, the EventID property matches the resource identifier for the event, with the top two bits masked off.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序编写事件使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>或 Win32 API `ReportEvent`、 EventID 属性匹配的事件的资源标识符、 顶部与两个位掩码的关闭</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The application-specific identifier for the event message.
trans-unit.target: 事件消息的应用程序特定标识符。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of this entry in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志中获取此项的索引。

trans-unit.source: This number is not necessarily zero-based.
trans-unit.target: 此数量不一定是从零开始。

trans-unit.source: The index of this entry in the event log.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志中此项的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource identifier that designates the message text of the event entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定事件项的消息文本的资源标识符。

trans-unit.source: The InstanceId property uniquely identifies an event entry for a configured event source.
trans-unit.target: InstanceId 属性唯一地标识配置的事件源的事件条目。

trans-unit.source: The InstanceId for an event log entry represents the full 32-bit resource identifier for the event in the message resource file for the event source.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志条目 InstanceId 表示为事件源的消息资源文件中的事件的完整的 32 位资源标识符。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EventID%2A> property equals the InstanceId with the top two bits masked off.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EventID%2A>属性值等于 InstanceId 使用屏蔽的前两个位关闭。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EventID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Two event log entries from the same source can have matching <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EventID%2A> values, but have different InstanceId values due to differences in the top two bits of the resource identifier.
trans-unit.target: 来自同一源的两个事件日志项可以有匹配<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EventID%2A>值，但具有不同的 InstanceId 值存在差异导致的资源标识符最高两位。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.EventID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application wrote the event entry using one of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A> methods, the InstanceId property matches the optional `eventId` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序写入事件项使用之一<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>方法，InstanceId 属性匹配可选`eventId`参数。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEntry%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application wrote the event using <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>, the InstanceId property matches the resource identifier specified in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A> of the `instance` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序编写事件使用<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>，InstanceId 属性中指定的资源标识符匹配<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A>的`instance`参数。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventInstance.InstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLog.WriteEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the application wrote the event using the Win32 API `ReportEvent`, the InstanceId property matches the resource identifier specified in the `dwEventID` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序写入事件使用 Win32 API `ReportEvent`，InstanceId 属性中指定的资源标识符匹配`dwEventID`参数。

trans-unit.source: For details about defining event messages and building event log resource files, see the "Message Compiler" topic in the Platform SDK documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何定义事件消息和生成事件日志资源文件的详细信息，请参阅处平台 SDK 文档中的"消息编译器"主题[http://msdn.microsoft.com](http://msdn.microsoft.com/)。

trans-unit.source: For details about event log identifiers, see the "Event Identifiers" topic in the Platform SDK.
trans-unit.target: 有关事件日志的标识符的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK 中的"事件标识符"主题。

trans-unit.source: A resource identifier that corresponds to a string definition in the message resource file of the event source.
trans-unit.target: 资源标识符，对应于事件源的消息资源文件中的字符串定义。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the computer on which this entry was generated.
trans-unit.target: 获取在其生成该项的计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the computer that contains the event log.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件日志的计算机的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets the localized message associated with this event entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取与该事件项关联的本地化的消息。

trans-unit.source: Getting this property opens the registry to determine the file name of the .dll file that contains the localized text.
trans-unit.target: 获取此属性将打开注册表项以确定包含本地化后的文本的.dll 文件的文件名。

trans-unit.source: If you receive a registry error when testing your source code, verify that the .dll file exists on the computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果测试你的源代码时，你会收到注册表错误，请验证计算机上存在的.dll 文件。

trans-unit.source: If insertion strings are included in the message, catch errors in their allocation.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入字符串包含消息中，捕获其分配中的错误。

trans-unit.source: The formatted, localized text for the message.
trans-unit.target: 消息的格式化、 本地化文本。

trans-unit.source: This includes associated replacement strings.
trans-unit.target: 这包括关联的替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: The space could not be allocated for one of the insertion strings associated with the message.
trans-unit.target: 与消息关联的插入字符串之一，无法分配空间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the replacement strings associated with the event log entry.
trans-unit.target: 获取与事件日志项关联的替换字符串。

trans-unit.source: This property retrieves only the replacement strings for the entry.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只检索的替换字符串的项。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve the full message, read the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要检索完整的消息，请阅读<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ReplacementStrings property contains the localized versions of replacement strings that are used in the event log entry.
trans-unit.target: ReplacementStrings 属性包含在事件日志条目中使用的替换字符串的本地化的版本。

trans-unit.source: If you provide resource files that contain strings in each target language for your application, you can emit event log messages in the language that is used on that computer.
trans-unit.target: 如果你提供包含在你的应用程序每个目标语言的字符串的资源文件，你可以发出该计算机使用的语言中的事件日志消息。

trans-unit.source: To do that, create an instance of the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager> class for the resource assembly that contains your replacement strings.
trans-unit.target: 为此，请创建的实例<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>包含替换字符串的资源程序集的类。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager>

trans-unit.source: The first parameter of the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%29> constructor identifies the resource assembly to be used.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%29>构造函数标识要使用的资源程序集。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Reflection.Assembly%29>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A> method of that instance to supply localized messages for log events.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A>该实例提供本地化的消息的日志事件的方法。</xref:System.Resources.ResourceManager.GetString%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following code automatically sets the message to the language for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码会自动设置用于当前区域性的语言的消息。

trans-unit.source: An array that holds the replacement strings stored in the event entry.
trans-unit.target: 包含的替换字符串数组存储在事件项。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the application that generated this event.
trans-unit.target: 获取生成此事件的应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The event source indicates what logged the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件源指示什么来记录事件。

trans-unit.source: It is often the name of the application or the name of a subcomponent of the application if the application is large.
trans-unit.target: 它通常是应用程序的名称或应用程序的子组件名称如果应用程序非常大。

trans-unit.source: Applications and services usually write to (and therefore are sources for) the Application log or a custom log.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序和服务通常写入到 （并且因此可用于的资源） 应用程序日志或自定义日志。

trans-unit.source: Device drivers usually write to the System log.
trans-unit.target: 设备驱动程序通常写入系统日志。

trans-unit.source: The name registered with the event log as the source of this event.
trans-unit.target: 事件日志中注册为此事件的源的名称。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 填充<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>序列化目标对象所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>要填充数据。

trans-unit.source: The destination (see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 目标 (请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) 此序列化。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the local time at which this event was generated.
trans-unit.target: 获取生成该事件的本地时间。

trans-unit.source: This member holds the time that an event was generated.
trans-unit.target: 此成员包含生成事件的时间。

trans-unit.source: This might not be the same as the time when the event information was written to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 这可能不是事件日志中的事件信息写入时的时间相同。

trans-unit.source: For the latter, read the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 对于后者，读取<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeWritten%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is usually a lag between the time that an event is generated and the time it is logged.
trans-unit.target: 通常是生成一个事件的时间和它记录的时间之间的延迟。

trans-unit.source: It is more important to know when the event was generated, unless you want to see if there is a significant lag in logging.
trans-unit.target: 很多重要知道生成事件的除非你想要查看的日志记录是否存在显著的滞后。

trans-unit.source: That can happen if your log files are on a different server and you are experiencing a bottleneck.
trans-unit.target: 如果日志文件位于不同的服务器上并且在遇到瓶颈，则可能发生的。

trans-unit.source: The local time at which this event was generated.
trans-unit.target: 生成该事件的本地时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the local time at which this event was written to the log.
trans-unit.target: 获取日志中写入此事件的本地时间。

trans-unit.source: This member holds the time that an event's information is written to the event log.
trans-unit.target: 此成员包含某一事件的信息写入事件日志的时间。

trans-unit.source: This might not be the same time as when the event was generated.
trans-unit.target: 这可能不在同一生成事件的时间。

trans-unit.source: For the latter, read the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeGenerated%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 对于后者，读取<xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeGenerated%2A>属性。</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventLogEntry.TimeGenerated%2A>

trans-unit.source: The local time at which this event was written to the log.
trans-unit.target: 日志中写入此事件的本地时间。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the user who is responsible for this event.
trans-unit.target: 获取负责该事件的用户的名称。

trans-unit.source: This property is often blank for events in logs other than the Security log.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常是空白中而不是安全日志的日志的事件。

trans-unit.source: The security identifier (SID) that uniquely identifies a user or group.
trans-unit.target: 唯一标识用户或组安全标识符 (SID)。

trans-unit.source: Account information could not be obtained for the user's SID.
trans-unit.target: 无法为用户的 SID 获取帐户信息。
